summary: The author Michel Houellebecq is abducted by three amateur kidnappers.
cast: Michel Houellebecq|Mathieu Nicourt|Maxime Lefrançois|Françoise Lebrun|Luc Schwarz|Veran Mauberret|Ginette Suchotzky|André Suchotzky|Marie Bourjala|Karim Achoui|François Samuelson|Vincent Janerot|Béatrice Mendy|Marie Schwarz|Ian Turiak|Patrick Chadaillat
title: El secuestro de Michel Houellebecq
